items.name: Drip Coffee
items.description: A cup of delicious batch brewed drip coffee.

items.name: Iced Espressor & Milk
items.description: A double shot of espresso with milk served on ice. All sizes contain a double shot of espresso, therefore larger = more milk.

items.name: Cold Brew
items.description: We brew this coffee at room temperature for 24 hours. It's strong, lower in acidity, and pumped through our nitro tap and served on ice.

items.name: Double Espresso
items.description: A double shot of espresso. Generally we have a blend & single origin offering. Espresso is meant to be enjoyed fresh, hot, & in a ceramic cup. Perhaps you'd even cleanse your palate first with some cool sparkling water, and then experience the symphony of complex flavors that allure & delight. The kind of thing that might even change your whole life... have I gone too far?

items.name: Espresso & Milk
items.description: A double shot of espresso with steamed milk. Each size contains a double shot of espresso. Therefore a bigger size = more milk.

items.name: Canned Beverages
items.description: Dram makes sparkling herbal canned beverages. They can be used to improve digestion, offer gentle detox support, relaxation and immune support, all while tasting, and looking beautiful.

items.name: Hot Chocolate
items.description: Made with 70% dark chocolate from Woodblock, steamed milk, and a touch of our house-made vanilla syrup.

items.name: Chai
items.description: We use Kilogram's masala chai (black tea, cinnamon, cardamom, ginger, cane sugar, & molasses) combined with the milk of your choice. We like to sprinkle a bit of cinnamon on top of a hot chai, so let us know in the notes if you'd rather not have cinnamon on top.

items.name: Matcha
items.description: Matcha: shade grown green tea ground into a fine powder. Generously whisked with hot water and combined with steamed milk. Add our house-made vanilla syrup to balance out some of the grassy/bitterness and to add a nice round sweetness.

items.name: Vegan & Gluten Free Cookies
items.description: These mind blowing little devils are gluten-free & dairy-free.

items.name: Pie Party
items.description: Fresh and seasonal hand pies from Pie Party

items.name: Pastries
items.description: Turnovers, muffins, & scones from Betony Traveling Cafe
